mapper.sql: id, doctor_id_originator, hospital_id_originator, deparment_id_originator, hospital_id_cooperation, deparment_id_cooperation, state, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into dept_cooperation
id,
doctor_id_originator,
hospital_id_originator,
deparment_id_originator,
hospital_id_cooperation,
deparment_id_cooperation,
state,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{doctorIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hospitalIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deparmentIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hospitalIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deparmentIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update dept_cooperation
doctor_id_originator = #{doctorIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hospital_id_originator = #{hospitalIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deparment_id_originator = #{deparmentIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hospital_id_cooperation = #{hospitalIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deparment_id_cooperation = #{deparmentIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dept_cooperation set doctor_id_originator = #{doctorIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hospital_id_originator = #{hospitalIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deparment_id_originator = #{deparmentIdOriginator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hospital_id_cooperation = #{hospitalIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deparment_id_cooperation = #{deparmentIdCooperation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select dc.*, dr.realname doctor_id_originator_name ,dp.name deparment_id_originator_name ,hs.name hospital_id_originator_name ,dpCooper.name deparment_id_cooperation_name ,hsCooper.name hospital_id_cooperation_name ,hs.logo hospital_originator_logo ,hsCooper.logo hospital_cooperation_logo ,dp.logo deparment_originator_logo ,dpCooper.logo deparment_cooperation_logo from dept_cooperation dc LEFT JOIN doctor dr ON dc.doctor_id_originator = dr.id left join department dp ON dc.deparment_id_originator=dp.id left join department dpCooper ON dc.deparment_id_cooperation=dpCooper.id LEFT JOIN hospital hs ON dc.hospital_id_originator = hs.id LEFT JOIN hospital hsCooper ON dc.hospital_id_cooperation = hsCooper.id WHERE 1=1
AND (dc.deparment_id_cooperation =#{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR dc.deparment_id_originator = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
and dc.state IN
#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and (hs.id !=#{notHospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT} OR hsCooper.id !=#{notHospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT n.id, n.state, h.logo fromLogo, d.id deparment, h.NAME fromhospitaname, d.NAME fromdepartmentname, h1.logo toLogo, h1.NAME tohospitalname, d1.NAME todepartmentname, n.type, n.create_time FROM dept_cooperation_review n INNER JOIN dept_cooperation de on n.dept_cooperation_id = de.id INNER JOIN hospital h ON h.id = de.hospital_id_originator INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = de.deparment_id_originator INNER JOIN hospital h1 ON h1.id = de.hospital_id_cooperation INNER JOIN department d1 ON d1.id = de.deparment_id_cooperation WHERE (de.deparment_id_originator = #{departmentId} OR de.deparment_id_cooperation =#{departmentId}) AND n.deparment_id = #{departmentId}

select dc.*, dr.realname doctor_id_originator_name ,dp.name deparment_id_originator_name ,hs.name hospital_id_originator_name ,dpCooper.name deparment_id_cooperation_name ,hsCooper.name hospital_id_cooperation_name ,drCooper.realname doctor_id_cooperation_name from dept_cooperation dc LEFT JOIN doctor dr ON dc.doctor_id_originator = dr.id left join department dp ON dc.deparment_id_originator=dp.id left join department dpCooper ON dc.deparment_id_cooperation=dpCooper.id LEFT JOIN hospital hs ON dc.hospital_id_originator = hs.id LEFT JOIN hospital hsCooper ON dc.hospital_id_cooperation = hsCooper.id LEFT JOIN doctor drCooper ON dc.doctor_id_cooperation = drCooper.id where 1=1
and dc.id=#{id}

select
from dept_cooperation where state = '3' AND (deparment_id_originator = #{0} AND deparment_id_cooperation = #{1}) OR (deparment_id_originator = #{1} AND deparment_id_cooperation = #{0})
